title: Basic Case Management Info
description: Outputs a header with the case management info
sql: SELECT * FROM CaseManagement WHERE Uuid = :CaseManagementUuid LIMIT 1

title: Tagged Social Media Profiles
description: Prints out the tagged social media profiles.
sql: SELECT * FROM ApiCoreData WHERE CaseManagementUuid = :CaseManagementUuid AND ContentTagsJson LIKE %social_media_profile%

title: YouTube Videos
sql: SELECT a.*, CASE WHEN COUNT(a2.ContentUuid) = 0 THEN json_array() ELSE json_group_array(json_object('ContentUuid', a1.ContentUuid, 'ContentNote', a1.ContentNote, 'ContentCreatedOn', a1.ContentCreatedOn, 'ContentTitle', a1.ContentTitle, 'ContentUrl', a1.ContentUrl)) End Videos, CASE WHEN COUNT(a2.ContentUuid) = 0 THEN json_array() ELSE json_group_array(json_object('ContentUuid', a2.ContentUuid, 'ContentNote', a2.ContentNote, 'ContentCreatedOn', a2.ContentCreatedOn, 'ContentTitle', a2.ContentTitle, 'ContentUrl', a2.ContentUrl)) END Images, CASE WHEN COUNT(a3.ContentUuid) = 0 THEN json_array() ELSE json_group_array(json_object('ContentUuid', a3.ContentUuid, 'ContentNote', a3.ContentNote, 'ContentCreatedOn', a1.ContentCreatedOn, 'ContentTitle', a3.ContentTitle, 'ContentUrl', a3.ContentUrl)) END Pages, CASE WHEN COUNT(a4.ContentUuid) = 0 THEN json_array() ELSE json_group_array(json_object('ContentUuid', a4.ContentUuid, 'ContentNote', a4.ContentNote, 'ContentCreatedOn', a4.ContentCreatedOn, 'ContentTitle', a4.ContentTitle, 'ContentUrl', a4.ContentUrl)) END Texts, CASE WHEN COUNT(a5.ContentUuid) = 0 THEN json_array() ELSE json_group_array(json_object('ContentUuid', a5.ContentUuid, 'ContentNote', a5.ContentNote, 'ContentCreatedOn', a5.ContentCreatedOn, 'ContentTitle', a5.ContentTitle, 'ContentUrl', a5.ContentUrl)) END Audios FROM ApiCoreData a LEFT JOIN ApiCoreData as a1 ON a.ContentUuid = a1.ContentRootUuid AND a1.ContentTypeName == 'video' LEFT JOIN ApiCoreData as a2 ON a.ContentUuid = a2.ContentRootUuid AND a2.ContentTypeName == 'image' LEFT JOIN ApiCoreData as a3 ON a.ContentUuid = a3.ContentRootUuid AND a3.ContentTypeName == 'mhtml' LEFT JOIN ApiCoreData as a4 ON a.ContentUuid = a4.ContentRootUuid AND a4.ContentTypeName == 'text' LEFT JOIN ApiCoreData as a5 ON a.ContentUuid = a5.ContentRootUuid AND a5.ContentTypeName == 'audio' WHERE a.ContentParentUuid IS NULL AND a.ContentRootUuid IS NULL AND a.CaseManagementUuid=:CaseManagementUuid AND ContentDomain LIKE '%youtube%' GROUP BY a.ContentUuid

title: YouTube Video Links
description: Outputs a list of YouTube video links
sql: SELECT * FROM ApiCoreData WHERE ContentDomain LIKE '%youtube%' AND CaseManagementUuid = :CaseManagementUuid AND ContentNodesJson = '[]' ORDER By ContentRelevance
